text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Morning everyone...
It feels like... it's been a while...

Yeah yeah! Even though we're in the same show,
the shoots are all over the place~!
That's right.

──Still, it's a fun set where you we can talk to each
other as part of the cast.

Haha, even I can tell how much fun you're having. The show's
bound to get a good vibe going because of it, don't you think?

Ooooh, what a compliment...!
I sure hope the fans enjoy it too, though.

I think you don't need to worry about that...!
After all...

The roles aren't that different from how you are, so each
of you play your role so naturally. The audience will love it.

I'm sure all of you here will feel close to one another after
doing this mini-drama.

Which means...
Heh, we really are getting closer, huh?
Don't you mean... closer to the roles?
Cuz I don't see the resemblence at all.

Eh~?
But you're stylish and kind just like in the role!

Haha... Of course, not everything is the same,
but I do think that role suits you perfectly, Mamimi.

...Well if you're going to stick with that,
then I guess that means my acting's spot on.

Fufu...! Interacting with Mamimi-chan...
was fun...

Even though... the characters are...
meeting for the first time...

They're gradually...
getting closer...

Yeah... The way that they're slowly closing 
the distance feels somehow nostalgic──

Nfufu~... Now I'm feelin' all giddy!
Ain't that sweet~!
